content:
ICS 1C HW 4 Submission Form

General Instructions

As part of UCI ICS 1C, Homework 4, complete and submit this form during lab on 26 August 1996.

You fill in the form by typing the information requested in each of the areas given below. Instructions on ``submitting'' your responses are given at the end of this document.

Team Member's Identification Information

Projects can be done individually or by a team of 2 or 3 members.

Team Member 1:
E-mail: .oac.uci.edu
Team Member 2:
E-mail: .oac.uci.edu
Team Member 3:
E-mail: .oac.uci.edu

Five distinct sites you've found

  1. URL of the first distinct site you found:

    Short description of this site:
  2. URL of the second distinct site you found:

    Short description of this site:
  3. URL of the third distinct site you found:

    Short description of this site:
  4. URL of the fourth distinct site you found:

    Short description of this site:
  5. URL of the fifth distinct site you found:

    Short description of this site:

Proposal

Submitting this assignment.
  1. Select the Preview the way your document will look option below and press the the Do It! button to perform the indicated action. Note: If you do not like the way your document looks, use the ``Back'' button on your browser to get back to this form.
  2. When you like the way your document looks, view its HTML source and save a copy of that source on your disk.
  3. Use a new web browser window to view the HTML document you just put on your disk.
  4. Now, use the ``Back'' button on your browser to get back to this form and select the second option (Submit this information via e-mail) and press the Do It! button again. The information will be mailed automatically.
  5. Use ftp/fetch to move a copy of the HTML document from your disk to the public_html area on your ea.oac.uci.edu or orion.oac.uci.edu account, naming it hw4prop.html, so that others can view it via the Web.

Preview the way your document will look
Submit this information via e-mail.

August 27, 1996 for ICS 1C
